definitions.text: a statement that is not literally false but that cleverly avoids an unpleasant truth
the deliberate act of failing to pay money
examples: his evasion of all his creditors

definitions.text: nonperformance of something distasteful (as by deceit or trickery) that you are supposed to do
examples: his evasion of his clear duty was reprehensible
that escape from the consequences is possible but unattractive

definitions.text: the act of physically escaping from something (an opponent or a pursuer or an unpleasant situation) by some adroit maneuver
